messages.content: Elise stands for real new choices. In our HOMES, striving to increase the standard of living for all. In our COMMUNITY, improving education, prioritising the NHS and supporting the Police and Social Services. In our NATION, supporting democracy and ensuring funding promised for the North, comes to Sheffield.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Striving to increase the standard of living for all.
Improving education, prioritising the NHS and supporting the Police and Social Services.
Supporting democracy and ensuring funding promised for the North comes to Sheffield.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for UKIP will hand keys of No. 10 to Miliband, poll finds.

issues.economy: COALITION OF CHAOS - DON'T LET YOUR VOTE PUT ED MILIBAND INTO NO. 10 PROPPED UP BY OTHER PARTIES.
issues.socialWelfare: Supporting the Police and Social Services.

housing.content: Increase the standard of living for all.

endorsements.endorsement: Authorized by Russell Cutts, on behalf of Elise Dunweber.

quotes.text: Voting for UKIP will hand keys of No. 10 to Miliband, poll finds.
I'll be the power broker in Westminster, says Salmond.
Vince Cable: Lib Dems could enter rainbow coalition with Labour and SNP

images.caption: Images of Elise Dunweber with constituents and in the community.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet includes statements about the potential negative consequences of a coalition government involving Ed Miliband and references to comments made by political figures from other parties.
